0110011010011011 0110010100001010 1 -> sum: 1100101110100110, cout: 0

1010100011111011 0010111101111101 0 -> sum: 1101100001111000, cout: 0
1011011110101100 1101110011010101 1 -> sum: 1001010010000010, cout: 1
0100001111111011 0010111111111011 1 -> sum: 0111001111110111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
